text:
We served over 70 people!

Las Vegas DSA is in the Historic Westside at the last Sunday of every month distributing hygiene products and other nessesities for our unhoused communities!

Those are the places people are getting help! Those are the people who want to be helped! Sometimes they panhandle outside the minimart, but it's so easy to say "I'm sorry, I don't carry cash but I hope you have a good day." These girls have more to fear from their next Tinder date than the unhoused
